summary: First-time filmmaker and award-winning photographer Sam Jones documents the recording of Wilco's album, "Yankee Hotel Foxtrot."
cast: Jeff Tweedy|John Stirratt|Leroy Bach|Glenn Kotche|Jay Bennett|Greg Kot|Tony Margherita|Fred Armisen|Wes Orshoski|Bill Bentley|David Bither|Lin Brehmer|Chris Brickley|Ken Coomer|David Fricke|Chris Green|Josh Grier|Daniel Herbst|Howie Klein|Miiri Kotche|Marty Lennartz|Fred Longberg Holm|Ron Lowe|Susan Miller Tweedy|Jim O'Rourke|Jonathan Parker|Leah Rivers|Jason Tobias|Sammy Tweedy|Spencer Tweedy|Jonathan Valania
title: I Am Trying to Break Your Heart
